title: Relates to community land mortgages and authorizes the state of New York mortgage agency to purchase community land mortgages from banks within the state
summary: Relates to the purchase of community land mortgages; defines a community land mortgage as a mortgage that is secured by a first lien on a leasehold estate in real property that is improved by a residential structure wherein title to the real property is retained by a not-for-profit housing company or housing development fund company; authorizes the state of New York mortgage agency to purchase community land mortgages from banks within the state; ensures not-for-profit housing remains as affordable housing.

       Introduced  by  M.  of  A.  FITZPATRICK -- read once and referred to the
         Committee on Housing

       AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to the  purchase
         of community land mortgages

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Section 2402 of the public authorities law  is  amended  by
    2  adding a new subdivision 18 to read as follows:
    3    (18)  "COMMUNITY LAND MORTGAGE". A MORTGAGE SECURED BY A FIRST LIEN ON
    4  A LEASEHOLD ESTATE IN REAL PROPERTY THAT IS IMPROVED  BY  A  RESIDENTIAL
    5  STRUCTURE   WHEREIN  TITLE  TO  THE  REAL  PROPERTY  IS  RETAINED  BY  A
    6  NOT-FOR-PROFIT HOUSING COMPANY OR HOUSING DEVELOPMENT FUND  COMPANY  AND
    7  THE  IMPROVEMENTS  THEREON  ARE  SOLD  TO  PERSONS OR FAMILIES OF LOW OR
    8  MODERATE INCOME WHO ALSO EXECUTE A LONG-TERM LEASE FOR THE REAL  PROPER-
    9  TY.
   10    S  2.  The  public  authorities law is amended by adding a new section
   11  2405-f to read as follows:
   12    S 2405-F. PURCHASE OF COMMUNITY LAND MORTGAGES.  (1) A PURPOSE OF  THE
   13  AGENCY  SHALL  BE TO PURCHASE COMMUNITY LAND MORTGAGES FROM BANKS WITHIN
   14  THE STATE DURING PERIODS WHEN THERE IS AN INADEQUATE  SUPPLY  OF  CREDIT
   15  AVAILABLE  FOR  NEW RESIDENTIAL MORTGAGES OR AVAILABLE FOR SUCH LOANS AT
   16  CARRYING CHARGES WITHIN THE FINANCIAL MEANS OF PERSONS AND  FAMILIES  OF
   17  LOW AND MODERATE INCOME.
   18    IT  IS  HEREBY  FOUND  AND DECLARED THAT SUCH ACTIVITIES BY THE AGENCY
   19  WILL ALLEVIATE A CONDITION IN THIS STATE WHICH IS CONTRARY TO THE PUBLIC
   20  HEALTH, SAFETY AND GENERAL WELFARE AND WHICH HAS CONSTITUTED IN THE PAST
   21  AND FROM TIME TO TIME IN THE FUTURE CAN  BE  EXPECTED  TO  CONSTITUTE  A
   22  PUBLIC  EMERGENCY.  IT  IS FURTHER FOUND AND DECLARED THAT SUCH PURPOSES
   23  ARE IN ALL RESPECTS FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE PEOPLE OF THE  STATE  OF  NEW
   24  YORK AND THE AGENCY SHALL BE REGARDED AS PERFORMING AN ESSENTIAL GOVERN-

        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.

    1  MENTAL  FUNCTION  IN  CARRYING  OUT  ITS  PURPOSES AND IN EXERCISING THE
    2  POWERS GRANTED BY THIS TITLE.
    3    (2)  THE  AGENCY SHALL PURCHASE COMMUNITY LAND MORTGAGES FROM BANKS AT
    4  SUCH PRICES AND UPON SUCH TERMS AND CONDITIONS AS  IT  SHALL  DETERMINE;
    5  PROVIDED,  HOWEVER,  THAT  THE  TOTAL  PURCHASE  PRICE, EXCLUSIVE OF ANY
    6  AMOUNTS REPRESENTING A REFUND OF COMMITMENT OR OTHER FEES PAID BY A BANK
    7  TO THE AGENCY, FOR ALL MORTGAGES WHICH THE AGENCY  COMMITS  TO  PURCHASE
    8  FROM  A BANK AT ANY ONE TIME SHALL IN NO EVENT BE MORE THAN THE TOTAL OF
    9  THE UNPAID PRINCIPAL BALANCES THEREOF, PLUS ACCRUED INTEREST THEREON.
   10    (3) IN CONDUCTING ITS PROGRAM OF PURCHASING COMMUNITY LAND  MORTGAGES,
   11  THE  AGENCY  SHALL  BE  GOVERNED  BY  THE PROVISIONS OF PARAGRAPH (B) OF
   12  SUBDIVISION THREE OF SECTION TWENTY-FOUR HUNDRED FIVE OF THIS PART.
   13    (4) THE AGENCY SHALL REQUIRE AS A CONDITION OF PURCHASE  OF  COMMUNITY
   14  LAND  MORTGAGES  FROM  BANKS  THAT EACH SUCH BANK CERTIFY THAT EACH SUCH
   15  COMMUNITY LAND MORTGAGE IS TO AN INDIVIDUAL BORROWER AND IS IN  ADDITION
   16  TO THE MORTGAGES SUCH CERTIFYING BANK OTHERWISE WOULD HAVE MADE.
   17    (4-A)  THE AGENCY MUST APPROVE THE GROUND LEASE USED BY THE LESSOR FOR
   18  THE LEASE OF THE REAL PROPERTY TO THE LESSEE.  SUCH  LEASE  MAY  CONTAIN
   19  CERTAIN RESALE PROVISIONS LIMITING FUTURE ELIGIBLE BUYERS AND/OR MAXIMUM
   20  SALES  PRICE  PROVIDED THAT SUCH PROVISIONS ARE RECORDED WITH THE APPRO-
   21  PRIATE PUBLIC OFFICIAL AND  THAT  THEY  TERMINATE  UPON  FORECLOSURE  OR
   22  ASSIGNMENT IN LIEU OF FORECLOSURE OF THE FIRST LEASEHOLD MORTGAGE.
   23    (5)  NOTWITHSTANDING  THE  MAXIMUM  INTEREST  RATE,  IF  ANY, FIXED BY
   24  SECTION 5-501 OF THE GENERAL  OBLIGATIONS  LAW  OR  ANY  OTHER  LAW  NOT
   25  SPECIFICALLY  AMENDING OR APPLICABLE TO THIS SECTION, THE AGENCY MAY SET
   26  THE INTEREST RATE TO BE BORNE BY COMMUNITY LAND MORTGAGES  PURCHASED  BY
   27  THE  AGENCY  FROM BANKS AT A RATE OR RATES WHICH THE AGENCY FROM TIME TO
   28  TIME SHALL DETERMINE TO BE AT LEAST SUFFICIENT, TOGETHER WITH ANY  OTHER
   29  AVAILABLE MONIES, TO PROVIDE FOR THE PAYMENT OF ITS BONDS AND NOTES, AND
   30  COMMUNITY  LAND MORTGAGES BEARING SUCH INTEREST RATE SHALL NOT BE DEEMED
   31  TO VIOLATE ANY SUCH LAW OR TO BE UNENFORCEABLE IF ORIGINATED BY  A  BANK
   32  IN GOOD FAITH PURSUANT TO AN UNDERTAKING WITH THE AGENCY WITH RESPECT TO
   33  THE SALE THEREOF NOTWITHSTANDING ANY SUBSEQUENT FAILURE OF THE AGENCY TO
   34  PURCHASE THE MORTGAGE OR ANY SUBSEQUENT SALE OR DISPOSITION OF THE MORT-
   35  GAGE BY THE AGENCY TO SUCH BANK OR ANY OTHER PERSON.
   36    (6)  THE  AGENCY  SHALL REQUIRE THE SUBMISSION TO IT BY EACH BANK FROM
   37  WHICH THE AGENCY HAS PURCHASED COMMUNITY LAND MORTGAGES EVIDENCE  SATIS-
   38  FACTORY  TO  THE AGENCY OF THE MAKING, AND IF APPLICABLE, THE SERVICING,
   39  OF SUCH COMMUNITY LAND MORTGAGES IN CONFORMITY WITH SUCH  BANK'S  UNDER-
   40  TAKING  WITH  THE  AGENCY  AND  IN CONNECTION THEREWITH MAY, THROUGH ITS
   41  EMPLOYEES OR AGENTS OR THOSE OF  THE  BANKING  DEPARTMENT,  INSPECT  THE
   42  BOOKS AND RECORDS OF ANY SUCH BANK.
   43    (7)  COMPLIANCE  BY  ANY  BANK WITH THE TERMS OF ITS AGREEMENT WITH OR
   44  UNDERTAKING TO THE AGENCY WITH RESPECT TO THE SALE, AND  IF  APPLICABLE,
   45  THE  SERVICING, OF COMMUNITY LAND MORTGAGES MAY BE ENFORCED BY DECREE OF
   46  THE SUPREME COURT. THE AGENCY MAY REQUIRE AS A CONDITION OF PURCHASE  OF
   47  COMMUNITY  LAND  MORTGAGES FROM ANY BANK THE CONSENT OF SUCH BANK TO THE
   48  JURISDICTION OF THE SUPREME COURT OVER ANY SUCH PROCEEDING.  THE  AGENCY
   49  MAY  ALSO  REQUIRE AGREEMENT BY ANY BANK, AS A CONDITION OF THE AGENCY'S
   50  PURCHASE OF COMMUNITY LAND MORTGAGES FROM SUCH BANK, TO THE  PAYMENT  OF
   51  PENALTIES TO THE AGENCY FOR VIOLATION BY THE BANK OF ITS UNDERTAKINGS TO
   52  THE  AGENCY,  AND SUCH PENALTIES SHALL BE RECOVERABLE AT THE SUIT OF THE
   53  AGENCY.
   54    (8) THE AGENCY SHALL REQUIRE AS A CONDITION OF PURCHASE OF ANY  COMMU-
   55  NITY  LAND  MORTGAGE  FROM A BANK THAT THE BANK REPRESENT AND WARRANT TO
   56  THE AGENCY THAT:

       A. 2735                             3

    1    (A) THE MORTGAGE WAS NOT MADE IN SATISFACTION OF AN OBLIGATION OF  THE
    2  BANK UNDER SECTION TWENTY-FOUR HUNDRED FIVE OF THIS PART;
    3    (B) THE UNPAID PRINCIPAL BALANCE OF THE MORTGAGE AND THE INTEREST RATE
    4  THEREON HAVE BEEN ACCURATELY STATED TO THE AGENCY;
    5    (C)  THE  AMOUNT  OF  THE  UNPAID  PRINCIPAL BALANCE IS JUSTLY DUE AND
    6  OWING;
    7    (D) THE BANK HAS NO NOTICE  OF  THE  EXISTENCE  OF  ANY  COUNTERCLAIM,
    8  OFFSET  OR  DEFENSE ASSERTED BY THE MORTGAGOR OR ANY SUCCESSOR IN INTER-
    9  EST;
   10    (E) THE MORTGAGE IS EVIDENCED BY A BOND OR PROMISSORY NOTE AND A MORT-
   11  GAGE DOCUMENT WHICH HAS BEEN  PROPERLY  RECORDED  WITH  THE  APPROPRIATE
   12  PUBLIC OFFICIAL;
   13    (F)  THE  MORTGAGE CONSTITUTES A VALID FIRST LIEN ON THE REAL PROPERTY
   14  LEASEHOLD DESCRIBED TO THE AGENCY SUBJECT ONLY TO  REAL  PROPERTY  TAXES
   15  NOT  YET DUE, INSTALLMENTS OF ASSESSMENTS NOT YET DUE, AND EASEMENTS AND
   16  RESTRICTIONS OF RECORD WHICH DO NOT  ADVERSELY  AFFECT,  TO  A  MATERIAL
   17  DEGREE, THE USE OR VALUE OF THE REAL PROPERTY OR IMPROVEMENTS THEREON;
   18    (G) THE MORTGAGOR IS NOT NOW IN DEFAULT IN THE PAYMENT OF ANY INSTALL-
   19  MENT  OF  PRINCIPAL  OR  INTEREST,  ESCROW FUNDS, REAL PROPERTY TAXES OR
   20  OTHERWISE IN THE PERFORMANCE OF HIS OBLIGATIONS UNDER THE MORTGAGE DOCU-
   21  MENTS AND HAS NOT TO THE KNOWLEDGE OF THE BANK BEEN IN  DEFAULT  IN  THE
   22  PERFORMANCE  OF  ANY  SUCH  OBLIGATION FOR A PERIOD OF LONGER THAN SIXTY
   23  DAYS DURING THE LIFE OF THE MORTGAGE; AND
   24    (H) THE IMPROVEMENTS TO THE  MORTGAGED  REAL  PROPERTY  LEASEHOLD  ARE
   25  COVERED BY A VALID AND SUBSISTING POLICY OF INSURANCE ISSUED BY A COMPA-
   26  NY  AUTHORIZED BY THE SUPERINTENDENT OF INSURANCE TO ISSUE SUCH POLICIES
   27  IN THE STATE OF NEW YORK AND PROVIDING FIRE AND EXTENDED COVERAGE TO  AN
   28  AMOUNT  NOT  LESS  THAN  EIGHTY  PERCENT  OF  THE INSURABLE VALUE OF THE
   29  IMPROVEMENTS TO THE MORTGAGED REAL PROPERTY.
   30    (9) EACH BANK SHALL BE LIABLE TO THE AGENCY FOR ANY  DAMAGES  SUFFERED
   31  BY  THE  AGENCY  BY  REASON  OF THE UNTRUTH OF ANY REPRESENTATION OR THE
   32  BREACH OF ANY WARRANTY AND, IN THE EVENT THAT ANY  REPRESENTATION  SHALL
   33  PROVE  TO BE UNTRUE WHEN MADE OR IN THE EVENT OF ANY BREACH OF WARRANTY,
   34  THE BANK SHALL, AT THE OPTION OF THE AGENCY, REPURCHASE THE MORTGAGE FOR
   35  THE ORIGINAL PURCHASE PRICE ADJUSTED FOR AMOUNTS SUBSEQUENTLY PAID THER-
   36  EON, AS THE AGENCY SHALL DETERMINE.
   37    (10) THE AGENCY NEED NOT REQUIRE THE RECORDING OF AN ASSIGNMENT OF ANY
   38  COMMUNITY LAND MORTGAGE PURCHASED BY IT FROM A  BANK  PURSUANT  TO  THIS
   39  SECTION  AND  SHALL  NOT  BE  REQUIRED  TO  NOTIFY  THE MORTGAGOR OF ITS
   40  PURCHASE OF THE MORTGAGE. THE AGENCY SHALL NOT BE REQUIRED TO INSPECT OR
   41  TAKE POSSESSION OF THE MORTGAGE DOCUMENTS IF THE  BANK  FROM  WHICH  THE
   42  COMMUNITY  LAND  MORTGAGE  IS  PURCHASED  BY  THE  AGENCY  SHALL ENTER A
   43  CONTRACT TO SERVICE SUCH MORTGAGE AND ACCOUNT TO THE AGENCY THEREFOR.
   44    (11) NOTWITHSTANDING ANY OTHER PROVISION OF LAW, THE AGENCY IS AUTHOR-
   45  IZED TO REQUIRE, AS A CONDITION TO THE PURCHASE FROM BANKS OF ANY COMMU-
   46  NITY LAND MORTGAGE, SUCH RESTRICTIONS UPON ASSUMABILITY OF THE MORTGAGE,
   47  DEFAULT PROVISIONS, RIGHTS TO ACCELERATE, AND OTHER TERMS APPLICABLE  TO
   48  SUCH  COMMUNITY LAND MORTGAGES MADE BY THE BANK PURSUANT TO UNDERTAKINGS
   49  WITH THE AGENCY WITH RESPECT TO THE  SALE  THEREOF  AS  THE  AGENCY  MAY
   50  DETERMINE  TO  BE  NECESSARY OR DESIRABLE TO ASSURE THE REPAYMENT OF ITS
   51  BONDS AND NOTES AND THE EXEMPTION  FROM  FEDERAL  INCOME  TAXES  OF  THE
   52  INTEREST  PAYABLE  ON  ITS  BONDS  AND  NOTES.  ALL  SUCH TERMS SHALL BE
   53  ENFORCEABLE BY THE ORIGINATING BANK, THE AGENCY, AND ANY SUCCESSOR HOLD-
   54  ER OF THE MORTGAGE UNLESS EXPRESSLY WAIVED IN WRITING BY OR ON BEHALF OF
   55  THE AGENCY.

       A. 2735                             4

    1    S 3. This act shall take effect on the one hundred twentieth day after
    2  it shall have become a law.
